Chargement des packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(eurostat)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
library(ggthemes)
library(mFilter)
```

# Utilisation des capacités de production

Importation des données 
```{r}
id <- "ei_bsin_q_r2"
cp <- get_eurostat(id)
cp_clean <- cp %>% 
  filter(s_adj == "SA", 
         geo == "PT",
         indic == "BS-ICU-PC") %>% 
  select(indic, TIME_PERIOD, values)
```
